about_title: "We produce everything — from software to integrated hardware-software solutions for electronic queue management. This is the core principle of Mobile Solutions.
about_subtitle: We create software and hardware to optimize the quality of customer service in organizations. Our systems help manage the flow of visitors, reduce waiting times, and enhance service quality. We develop and manufacture solutions right here in Uzbekistan to make them more accessible for local organizations.

our_mission_title: We are changing people's attitudes towards queues
our_mission_subtitle: Everything we do today will change the queuing system of tomorrow. The iQueue team is creating a system free from long lines, bureaucracy, complex processes, and endless waiting. We develop the app and produce information displays right here in Uzbekistan to make the process even more accessible and efficient.
